Get 250 Points After First Purchase

Join now and you’ll be more than halfway to your first $5 reward! You’ll also earn 5 points for every $1 spent each time you check in. At 400 points, enjoy a $5 reward. Plus get access to exclusive offers just by being a member.*

*Offer subject to Rewards Program Terms at https://checkers.com/rewards-terms. Only at participating locations.

LOCAL OFFERS

$2.49 Fry-Seasoned Chicken Tender Wrap or Bacon Ranch Cheeseburger

Fry-seasoned and snack-sized! Checkers & Rally’s new Fry-Seasoned Chicken Tender Wrap is made with a Fry-Seasoned Chicken Tender topped with crisp iceberg lettuce, shredded cheese and our signature ranch all served in a warm flour tortilla. Or try Checkers & Rally’s new Bacon Ranch Cheeseburger made with our 100% beef hamburger patty topped with our signature ranch, crispy bacon, dill pickles and American cheese all served on a toasted, sesame seed bun. Available at participating locations.

Bacon Swiss Buford

We are bringing back the Bacon Swiss Buford - a different take on our signature burger! Two large hand-seasoned, 100% beef hamburger patties topped with two strips of crispy bacon, Swiss cheese, crisp iceberg lettuce, two slices of Roma tomato, two crinkle-cut dill pickles, two slices of red onion, ketchup, mustard and mayonnaise, all served on a bakery-style bun. Get it, before it’s gone again, only at Checkers and Rally’s. Available at participating locations.

Get 250 Points After First Purchase

Join now and you’ll be more than halfway to your first $5 reward! You’ll also earn 5 points for every $1 spent each time you check in. At 400 points, enjoy a $5 reward. Plus get access to app-exclusive offers just by being a member. Offer subject to Rewards Program Terms at https://checkers.com/rewards-terms. Available at participating locations.

GOOD. CLEAN. FUN.

At Checkers & Rally's we know that our guests want to Be Safe and See Safe!

Frequently Asked Questions

Guests will earn 5 points for every $1 they spend. Once a guest collects 400 points they will receive a $5 reward which is automatically added to their Rewards Wallet. The reward can be used on the next visit simply by checking in using the Checkers and Rally’s mobile app or by providing your account phone number to the cashier at the time of purchase.

When you register, you will be asked to provide your first name, last name, phone number, birthday, and e-mail address. During registration, you will also be asked to create a username and password to access your account

No, there is no cost associated with becoming a Checkers & Rally’s Rewards member.

Easily redeem your rewards by providing our cashier your phone number or email address or scan your rewards app.

To see a full list of job openings in your area, please click the link Job Opportunities

You can become a Checkers & Rally's Rewards member in two ways: sign up online or downloading our app.

About Checkers N Perry St

Checkers was born out of the idea that boring and bland have no place in the burger world. That’s why we’ve been slinging the best burgers, crispiest fries, and the creamiest milkshakes for a price that is hard to beat. And because we believe flavor shouldn’t have a timeline, we’re open late every night of the week. So embrace your inner Fast Foodie and come see us at Checkers on 780 N Perry St in Pontiac
